Products.ProductDescription: SUDS Exterior Soap has been specially formulated to powerfully clean your car as it protects your wax finish. With harsh chemical and stripping agents, most soap can cause damage to your automobile. Sure they may be easy to use, but along with removing dirt, they also remove your finish and protective coatings. That is why SUDS is the perfect balance of shielding your wax and protective coatings, while also removing unsightly dirt and road grime. SUDS, the ultimate soap that helps to keep a shine on your paint without harsh stripping agents that can damage surfaces, is environmentally friendly and biodegradable. With SUDS you do not have to worry about water spots or causing â€œspider webâ€ marks in your paint finish because of its revolutionary lubricating agents to remove the dirt.

Products.ProductDescription: SUPPLE Leather and Vinyl Conditioner was developed to maintain the elite leather seats found on today's private aircraft, and now it is available for your car. Imagine your seats looking and feeling as good as the day you drove your car off the showroom floor. Using SUPPLE will ensure that your leather seats last for the life of your automobile.It is not only the everyday use that causes leather to wear and tear, but using products containing substances such as silicone and waxes that are not specifically designed to condition and protect delicate surfaces similar to leather. When exposed to the elements and everyday traffic, it is essential to replace natural oils into leather interior to prevent deterioration and aging. After completing a routine interior cleaning, apply SUPPLE to all leather surfaces to not only create a barrier of protection, but to bring back its original luster.

Products.ProductName: Aero View : Interior & Exterior Window Cleaner 16 oz.
Products.ProductDescription: Nothing says clean car better than having perfectly clean, streak-free windows and mirrors. At International Aero, when challenged with detailing the world's most exclusive aircraft, we needed nothing less than the perfect window cleaner. Our team invented VIEW, the ultimate glass cleaner. Not only will it remove the thousands of miles of dirt picked up in the atmosphere, but leaves the glass surface clean, clear and streak-free. If it performs this well on jets, just imagine the beautiful results you will receive on your car. VIEW Glass Cleaner is excellent for cleaning all glass surfaces.It quickly dissolves fingerprints, smudges, dust and dirt while leaving glass and mirrors with a brilliant streak-free shine. This fast acting formula does not streak and will not leave any residue making everything on your car from automotive glass to headlights crystal clear. The ammonia-free product is safe, yet powerful enough to remove unsightly dirt and grime.

Products.ProductDescription: <inline style="font-size: 16px;">Formulated to remove heavy soil, brake dust and grease found on aircraft safely and effectively, AWAY is an environmentally friendly degreaser. It is a must that our degreaser perform to the very highest quality standards removing all dirt, soil, grease or brake dust from the surface of aircraft, while being gentle on sensitive components and specially treated surfaces. AWAY degreaser will replace a shelf or two of cleaning products in your garage. It works as a bug & tar remover, a wheel cleaner, a tire cleaner and an engine degreaser. AWAY cleaner is powerful enough to cut through grease on engines and baked-on brake dustâ€¦ even on roughcast aluminum wheels. Tar, sap, and bugs will break down in just a matter of seconds.</inline>

Products.ProductDescription:
Street Performance Series : J-Pipe without Catalyst #92P113
BALANCED SOUND AND PERFORMANCE

Hear the Difference

  • How does it sound?
    The MRT J-Pipe without Catalyst #92P113 has an aggressive, muscle car sound and a louder turbo sound.
  • Is there drone or resonance?
    Drone is comfortable and hardly noticeable.
  • What if I step on it?
    Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound.

Feel the Performance

  • What is the muffler design?
    Straight through design to provide maximum exhaust gas flow.
  • What is the tube diameter?
    3" diameter exhaust tube eliminates the initial restriction point after the turbo of the stock down-pipe.
  • What are the performance gains?
    Reduced back-flow and improved gas flow, provide for noticeable HP and torque gains.

Get Noticed

  • What kind of tip is it?
    No tips are required for this system.
  • What are my system finish options?
    Stainless Steel : No Finish
    Black Ops : Total System Blackout.
  • What are my tip finish options?
    No finishes available for this option.
  • This application is for off road use only.

Vehicle Application

  • Which vehicles does this fit?
    2015, 2016, 2017, 2018 and 2019
    4th Gen Subaru WRX.
  • What doesn't it fit?
    Subaru WRX STI.
  • Does it require a tune?
    No tune is required for this type of upgrade.

Product Quality
  • What kind of steel is it made from?
    Corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel.
  • Where is it made?
    Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA.
  • How long is the Warranty?
    Limited Lifetime Warranty (See Warranty Page for Details)

Installation

  • Can I install this myself?
    MRT engineers this Premium Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation.
  • How long does it take to install?
    Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools.
  • What is included?
    All necessary hardware included.

Products.ProductName: 2015 - 2018 Subaru WRX, WRX STI MRT Cat-Back
Products.ProductDescription:
2015 - 2018 4th Generation Subaru WRX and WRX STI Cat-Back Performance Exhaust System
by MRT: Hear the Difference, Feel the Performance, Get Noticed!

LOUDNESS RATING: 6 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being OMG loud, when all other components are stock)

DRONE RATING: 2 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being intolerable, when all other components are stock)

PERFORMANCE RATING: 8.5 * (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being the maximum possible performance gain from an exhaust system, when all other components are stock)
HEAR THE DIFFERENCE:
  • Add a deep, pleasing performance sound to your Subie WRX or WRX STI
  • Straight through sound absorbing muffler produces a deep and refined performance sound from idle throughout the RPM range
  • Resist the urge to put your foot in it to keep the RPMs and sound levels lower
  • Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound
  • If deep performance sound that becomes louder as you increase your acceleration fits your desire, this is the system for you

FEEL THE PERFORMANCE:
  • Straight through muffler design provides for maximum exhaust gas flow
  • Larger exhaust tube reduces weight and exhaust gas flow restrictions producing noticeable performance gains
  • Higher exhaust flow prepares for future performance modifications
  • Lighter weight assembly as compared to stock exhaust system improves all aspects of performance
  • Higher exhaust flow and lighter weight improves gas mileage fuel economy
  • Cat-back system eliminates the factory mufflers for added power and weight reduction
  • Longer lengths of increased diameter tube of the cat-back system means even more gas flow and performance improvements than an axle-back system

GET NOTICED:
  • Quad 4-inch double wall, polished T304 stainless steel tips with beveled edges add style to your ride
  • If you prefer a blackout look for the exhaust tips, choose the matte black Cerakote finish
  • Great sound and great looks turn heads and get positive comments!

HANDCRAFTED QUALITY:
  • Industry exclusive 100% T304 stainless steel straight through mufflers
  • Constructed from corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel tube, the best quality stainless steel for exhaust systems
  • All component parts (hangers, clamps, bolts) are stainless steel
  • CNC mandrel bending technology for precise fit
  • Unique proprietary manufacturing and quality control process produces the highest quality constructed and best fitting exhaust in the industry
  • Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA
  • Backed by industry leading Limited Lifetime Warranty

INSTALLATION:
  • Direct bolt-in upgrade requires no cutting or welding to install and eases re-installation of stock exhaust system
  • MRT engineers this Performance Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation
  • Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools
  • All necessary hardware included

APPLICATION:
  • Fits 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018 Subaru WRX and WRX STI
  • Combine this system with the MRT Performance J-Pipe without Catalyst and the MRT Performance Mid-Pipe to get a full 3-inch system from the turbo to the tips (WRX only)
  • No tune required

Products.ProductName: 2015 - 2018 Subaru WRX MRT Turbo-Back Without Cats
Products.ProductDescription:
2015 - 2018 4th Generation Subaru WRX Turbo-Back Performance Exhaust System without Catalytic Converter
by MRT: Hear the Difference, Feel the Performance, Get Noticed!

LOUDNESS RATING: 7 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being OMG loud, when all other components are stock)

DRONE RATING: 2 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being intolerable, when all other components are stock)

PERFORMANCE RATING: 10 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being the maximum possible performance gain from an exhaust system, when all other components are stock)

HEAR THE DIFFERENCE:
  • Add a deep, pleasing performance sound to your Subie WRX
  • Elimination of factory catalyst increases aggressiveness of exhaust sound and adds louder turbo sound
  • Straight through sound absorbing muffler produces a deep and refined performance sound from idle throughout the RPM range
  • Resist the urge to put your foot in it to keep the RPMs and sound levels lower
  • Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound
  • If deep performance sound that becomes louder as you increase your acceleration fits your desire, this is the system for you

FEEL THE PERFORMANCE:
  • Replaces the factory downpipe and eliminates the catalytic converter with larger 3-inch tubing resulting in the fastest possible turbo spooling
  • Larger diameter exhaust tube eliminates the initial restriction point after the turbo of the stock downpipe allowing exhaust gases to flow at a much more rapid rate
  • Mandrel tube bending provides for the smooth flow of exhaust gases
  • Straight through muffler design provides for maximum exhaust gas flow
  • Larger exhaust tube reduces weight and exhaust gas flow restrictions producing noticeable performance gains
  • Higher exhaust flow prepares for future performance modifications
  • Lighter weight assembly as compared to stock exhaust system improves all aspects of performance
  • Larger exhaust tube and lighter weight over stock exhaust system improves gas mileage fuel economy
  • Longer lengths of increased diameter tube of the turbo-back system means even more gas flow and performance improvements than an axle-back system

GET NOTICED:
  • Quad 4-inch double wall, polished T304 stainless steel tips with beveled edges add style to your ride
  • If you prefer a blackout look for the exhaust tips, choose the matte black Cerakote finish
  • Great sound and great looks turn heads and get positive comments!

HANDCRAFTED QUALITY:
  • Industry exclusive 100% T304 stainless steel straight through mufflers
  • Constructed from corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel tube, the best quality stainless steel for exhaust systems
  • All component parts (hangers, clamps, bolts) are stainless steel
  • CNC mandrel bending technology for precise fit
  • Unique proprietary manufacturing and quality control process produces the highest quality constructed and best fitting exhaust in the industry
  • Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA
  • Backed by industry leading Limited Lifetime Warranty

INSTALLATION:
  • Eliminates factory catalyst
  • Direct bolt-in upgrade requires no cutting or welding to install and eases re-installation of stock exhaust system
  • MRT engineers this Performance Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation
  • Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools
  • All necessary hardware included

APPLICATION:
  • Fits 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018 Subaru WRX
  • Does not fit Subaru WRX STI; see MRT Turbo-Back Performance Exhaust System without Cats for the 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018 Subaru WRX STI
  • Off road use only
  • Emissions compliance not warranted; you are responsible to verify local requirements
  • Custom tune recommended; call MRT at (734) 455-5807 for availability

Products.ProductDescription:
Street Performance Series : MRT Version 2 Cat-Back : DMS #92U801
BALANCED SOUND AND PERFORMANCE

Hear the Difference

  • How does it sound?
    The MRT Version 2 Cat-Back #92U801 has a balanced, deep muscle car sound.
  • Is there drone or resonance?
    Drone is comfortable and hardly noticeable.
  • What if I step on it?
    Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound.

Feel the Performance

  • What is the muffler design?
    Straight through design to provide maximum exhaust gas flow.
  • What is the tube diameter?
    Large 2.5" tube is used for reduced exhaust flow restrictions.
  • What are the performance gains?
    Reducing restriction and maximizing flow provide for noticeable gains.

Get Noticed

  • What kind of tip is it?
    3.5" double wall, polished T304 stainless steel tips with beveled edges.
  • What are my system finish options?
    Metal SS : No Finish or the Black Ops : Total System Blackout.
  • What are my tip finish options?
    Metal SS : Polished Tips or the Black Ops : Dual Tip Blackout.

Vehicle Application

  • Which vehicles does this fit?
    2016, 2017, 2018 and 2019
    Camaro V6 Coupe and Convertible.
  • What doesn't it fit?
    Camaro SS or I4 Engine Package.
  • Does it require a tune?
    No tune is required for this type of upgrade.

Product Quality
  • What kind of steel is it made from?
    Corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel.
  • Where is it made?
    Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA.
  • How long is the Warranty?
    Limited Lifetime Warranty (See Warranty Page for Details)

Installation

  • Can I install this myself?
    MRT engineers this Premium Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation.
  • How long does it take to install?
    Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools.
  • What is included?
    All necessary hardware included.

Products.ProductName: 2015 - 2018 Subaru WRX MRT J-Pipe (Wthout Catalyst) and Mid-Pipe
Products.ProductDescription:
2015 - 2018 4th Generation Subaru WRX MRT Turbo-Back Performance Exhaust System, J-Pipe (Downpipe) without Catalyst and Mid-Pipe (Intermediate Pipe) Only
by MRT: Hear the Difference, Feel the Performance, Get Noticed!

LOUDNESS RATING: 6 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being OMG loud, when all other components are stock)

DRONE RATING: 2 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being intolerable, when all other components are stock)

PERFORMANCE RATING: 8.5 ** (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being the maximum possible performance gain from an exhaust system, when all other components are stock)

HEAR THE DIFFERENCE:
  • Add depth to the exhaust note of your Subaru WRX
  • Increase aggressiveness of exhaust sound and add louder turbo sound

FEEL THE PERFORMANCE:
  • 3-inch diameter exhaust tube eliminates the initial restriction point after the turbo of the stock downpipe and stock mid-pipe allowing exhaust gases to flow at a much more rapid rate
  • Elimination of catalyst provides maximum flow
  • Mandrel tube bending provides for the smooth flow of exhaust gases
  • Reduce back-pressure and improve performance as much as possible without having to replace the entire OEM cat-back exhaust system
  • Improved exhaust gas flow and reduced back-pressure means real horsepower and torque gains as well as an increase in fuel economy

GET NOTICED:
  • Great sound boldly announces your presence, turns heads, and gets positive comments!

HANDCRAFTED QUALITY:
  • Constructed from corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel tube, the best quality stainless steel for exhaust systems
  • All component parts (mufflers, hangers, clamps, bolts) are stainless steel
  • CNC mandrel bending technology for precise fit
  • Unique proprietary manufacturing and quality control process produces the highest quality constructed and best fitting exhaust in the industry
  • Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA
  • Backed by industry leading Limited Lifetime Warranty

INSTALLATION:
  • Replaces the highly restrictive factory J-pipe (or downpipe) and resonator pipe
  • Replaces the highly restrictive factory mid-pipe (or intermediate pipe)
  • Both pipes in combination maintain optimal ground clearance
  • Both the J-pipe and the mid-pipe are not interchangeable with the corresponding factory pipes; they are components of the MRT Turbo-Back Performance Exhaust System for the 2015 - 2018 Subaru WRX
  • MRT engineers this Performance Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation
  • Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools
  • All necessary hardware included

APPLICATION:
  • Fits 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018 Subaru WRX
  • Does not fit Subaru WRX STI
  • Connects only to the MRT cat-back component of the MRT Turbo-Back Performance Exhaust System for the 2015 - 2018 Subaru WRX, available separately
  • Off road use only
  • Emissions compliance not warranted; you are responsible to verify local requirements

Products.ProductDescription_AbovePricing:
LOUDNESS: 6 | DRONE: 2 | PERFORMANCE: 8
Write a review

Products.ProductDescription:
2015 - 2018 4th Generation Subaru WRX Turbo-Back Performance Exhaust System, Cat-Back Only
by MRT: Hear the Difference, Feel the Performance, Get Noticed!

LOUDNESS RATING: 6 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being OMG loud, when all other components are stock)

DRONE RATING: 2 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being intolerable, when all other components are stock)

PERFORMANCE RATING: 8.5 ** (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being the maximum possible performance gain from an exhaust system, when all other components are stock)
HEAR THE DIFFERENCE:
  • Add a deep, pleasing performance sound to your Subie WRX
  • Straight through sound absorbing muffler produces a deep and refined performance sound from idle throughout the RPM range
  • Resist the urge to put your foot in it to keep the RPMs and sound levels lower
  • Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound
  • If deep performance sound that becomes louder as you increase your acceleration fits your desire, this is the system for you

FEEL THE PERFORMANCE:
  • Straight through muffler design provides for maximum exhaust gas flow
  • Larger exhaust tube reduces weight and exhaust gas flow restrictions producing noticeable performance gains
  • Higher exhaust flow prepares for future performance modifications
  • Lighter weight assembly as compared to stock exhaust system improves all aspects of performance
  • Higher exhaust flow and lighter weight improves gas mileage fuel economy
  • Cat-back system eliminates the factory mufflers for added power and weight reduction
  • Longer lengths of increased diameter tube of the cat-back system means even more gas flow and performance improvements than an axle-back system

GET NOTICED:
  • Quad 4-inch double wall, polished T304 stainless steel tips with beveled edges add style to your ride
  • If you prefer a blackout look for the exhaust tips, choose the matte black Cerakote finish
  • Great sound and great looks turn heads and get positive comments!

HANDCRAFTED QUALITY:
  • Industry exclusive 100% T304 stainless steel straight through mufflers
  • Constructed from corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel tube, the best quality stainless steel for exhaust systems
  • All component parts (mufflers, hangers, clamps, bolts) are stainless steel
  • CNC mandrel bending technology for precise fit
  • Unique proprietary manufacturing and quality control process produces the highest quality constructed and best fitting exhaust in the industry
  • Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA
  • Backed by industry leading Limited Lifetime Warranty

INSTALLATION:
  • Connects only to the mid-pipe of the MRT J-Pipe (without Catalyst) and Mid-Pipe components of the MRT Turbo-Back Performance Exhaust System for the 2015 - 2018 Subaru WRX
  • MRT engineers this Performance Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation
  • Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools
  • All necessary hardware included

APPLICATION:
  • Fits 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018 Subaru WRX
  • Does not fit WRX STI
  • Combine this system with the 2015 - 2018 Subaru WRX MRT Turbo-Back Performance Exhaust System, J-Pipe (without Catalyst) and Mid-Pipe Only to get a full 3-inch system from the turbo to the tips (WRX only)
  • Off road use only
  • Emissions compliance not warranted; you are responsible to verify local requirements

Products.ProductDescription:
• JMS PedalMAX works onmost 2008 - 2018 Chrysler, Dodge & Jeep Vehicles
  • Eliminate turbo lag on turbocharges and diesel vehicles (improves vehicle acceleration).
  • Enhance low and mid-range horsepower and torque
  • Increase throttle response and make your vehicle easier to drive
  • Eliminate stalling when accelerating from a stop on manual transmission vehicles
  • Easy plug and play installation - installs in less than five minutes
  • Optional remote adjustment knob - use to dial in your exact throttle enhancement setting
  • Can also be stacked with a JMS custom tune file delivered to the ECU via an SCT handheld device

Quick Details
  • Eliminate Turbo Lag

  • Enhance Torque

    Performance Upgrade
    Top Selling Product

    Optional Remote
    Recommended by MRT
    Stackable - JMS Products
    Power Upgrade
Products.ProductFeatures:
The JMS PedalMAX Throttle Response Controller is a simple, affordable upgrade that greatly increases the responsiveness of your vehicle across the full RPM range. This product fits most 2007-2016 Chrysler, Dodge & Jeep vehicles.

Offering easy plug and play installation, the JMS PedalMAX Controller lets you enjoy the performance benefits of this upgrade in a matter of minutes. No calibration adjustments are required. The controller will work with your vehicle, regardless of whether it is stock or heavily modified.

The JMS Throttle Response Controller is an easy and effective way to improve throttle response and driving characteristics of vehicle. It is a digital microprocessor-controlled device and dramatically improves throttle reaction and acceleration.

The JMS PedalMax controller can be stacked or used in conjunction with common aftermarket OBD-II programmers and monitors, including SCT Handheld Tuners. However, no additional calibration is required to reap the benefits.

Vehicles Supported:

2008-2016 Dodge Challenger
2006-2016 Dodge Charger
2007-2011 Dodge Dakota
2006-2016 Dodge Durango
2007-2011 Dodge Nitro
2007-2016 Dodge Ram 1500
2007-2016 Dodge Ram 2500
2007-2016 Dodge Ram 3500
2007-2016 Dodge Ram 4500
2007-2016 Dodge Ram 5500
2011-2016 Chrysler 300
2015-2016 Jeep Cherokee
2011-2016 Jeep Compass
2007-2016 Jeep Grand Cherokee
2007-2016 Jeep Patriot
2012-2016 Jeep Wrangler

Products.ProductName: MRT Original No Drill Hood Struts #80J140
Products.ProductDescription:
Don't let your factory prop rod distract from your beautiful engine bay. Give your engine bay a clean, custom look with MRT Hood Struts for the 2013+ Ford Focus, featuring the MRT Original "No Drill" design.

Unlike other Hood Strut Kits in the aftermarket, the MRT kit requires NO DRILLING for installation. Only slight trimming of the weather strip is required. MRT Hood Struts easily install in 15 minutes or less from start to finish. The only tools required are a ratchet with 10 mm and 13 mm sockets. Because MRT designed this kit specifically for the 2013+ Ford Focus, there are no extra modifications to the vehicle. Components simply bolt on at OEM factory mounting locations.

The gas cylinders in this MRT kit features a black powder-coat finish. The standard finish for the hood strut bracket is a satin black powder-coat. Several finish options are available for the hood strut brackets. To give your Focus a personalized touch, upgrade to one of our many custom paint options. Select your custom paint option above or contact MRT at (734) 455-5807 to order. Please allow a 1 to 2 week lead time for custom painted brackets.

Note: The MRT hood struts are designed to work with the stock OEM hood. Aftermarket hoods may require different cylinders. The weight of the aftermarket hood is required to supply you with the correct cylinders. Please contact MRT at (734) 455-5807 for more information.

Products.ProductDescription:
Street Performance Series : MRT Version 2 Cat-Back #92U821
BALANCED SOUND AND PERFORMANCE

Hear the Difference

  • How does it sound?
    The MRT Version 2 Cat-Back #92U821 has a balanced, deep muscle car sound.
  • Is there drone or resonance?
    Drone is comfortable and hardly noticeable.
  • What if I step on it?
    Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound.

Feel the Performance

  • What is the muffler design?
    Straight through design to provide maximum exhaust gas flow.
  • What is the tube diameter?
    Large 2.5" tube is used for reduced exhaust flow restrictions.
  • What are the performance gains?
    Reducing restriction and maximizing flow provide for noticeable gains.

Get Noticed

  • What kind of tip is it?
    3.5" double wall, polished T304 stainless steel tips with beveled edges.
  • What are my system finish options?
    Metal SS : No Finish or the Black Ops : Total System Blackout.
  • What are my tip finish options?
    Metal SS : Polished Tips or the Black Ops : Dual Tip Blackout.

Vehicle Application

  • Which vehicles does this fit?
    2016, 2017, 2018 and 2019
    Camaro I4 Coupe and Convertible.
  • What doesn't it fit?
    Camaro SS or V6 Engine Package.
  • Does it require a tune?
    No tune is required for this type of upgrade.

Product Quality
  • What kind of steel is it made from?
    Corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel.
  • Where is it made?
    Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA.
  • How long is the Warranty?
    Limited Lifetime Warranty (See Warranty Page for Details)

Installation

  • Can I install this myself?
    MRT engineers this Premium Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation.
  • How long does it take to install?
    Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools.
  • What is included?
    All necessary hardware included.

Products.ProductName: 2015 - 2018 Subaru WRX STI MRT Turbo-Back WIth DMS
Products.ProductDescription:
2015 - 2018 4th Generation Subaru WRX STI Drone Management System TM (DMS TM) Turbo-Back Performance Exhaust System without Catalytic Converter
by MRT: Hear the Difference, Feel the Performance, Get Noticed!

LOUDNESS RATING: 7 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being OMG loud, when all other components are stock)

DRONE RATING: 2 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being intolerable, when all other components are stock)

PERFORMANCE RATING: 10 (On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being stock and 10 being the maximum possible performance gain from an exhaust system, when all other components are stock)

HEAR THE DIFFERENCE:
  • Add a deep, pleasing performance sound to your Subie WRX STI
  • Elimination of factory catalyst increases aggressiveness of exhaust sound and adds louder turbo sound
  • Straight through sound absorbing muffler produces a deep and refined performance sound from idle throughout the RPM range
  • Resist the urge to put your foot in it to keep the RPMs and sound levels lower
  • Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound
  • If deep performance sound that becomes louder as you increase your acceleration fits your desire, this is the system for you
  • MRTâ€™s proprietary Drone Management System TM (DMS TM) includes a tuned resonance chamber specific to this particular cat-back performance exhaust system
  • DMS TM actively manages drone levels to increase the comfort of the driver and passengers inside the vehicle and provide a unique performance sound

FEEL THE PERFORMANCE:
  • Replaces the factory downpipe and eliminates the catalytic converter with larger 3-inch tubing resulting in the fastest possible turbo spooling
  • Larger diameter exhaust tube eliminates the initial restriction point after the turbo of the stock downpipe allowing exhaust gases to flow at a much more rapid rate
  • Mandrel tube bending provides for the smooth flow of exhaust gases
  • Straight through muffler design provides for maximum exhaust gas flow
  • Larger exhaust tube reduces weight and exhaust gas flow restrictions producing noticeable performance gains
  • Higher exhaust flow prepares for future performance modifications
  • Lighter weight assembly as compared to stock exhaust system improves all aspects of performance
  • Larger exhaust tube and lighter weight over stock exhaust system improves gas mileage fuel economy
  • Longer lengths of increased diameter tube of the turbo-back system means even more gas flow and performance improvements than an axle-back system

GET NOTICED:
  • Quad 4-inch double wall, polished T304 stainless steel tips with beveled edges add style to your ride
  • If you prefer a blackout look for the exhaust tips, choose the matte black Cerakote finish
  • Great sound and great looks turn heads and get positive comments!

HANDCRAFTED QUALITY:
  • Industry exclusive 100% T304 stainless steel straight through mufflers
  • Constructed from corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel tube, the best quality stainless steel for exhaust systems
  • All component parts (hangers, clamps, bolts) are stainless steel
  • CNC mandrel bending technology for precise fit
  • Unique proprietary manufacturing and quality control process produces the highest quality constructed and best fitting exhaust in the industry
  • Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA
  • Backed by industry leading Limited Lifetime Warranty

INSTALLATION:
  • Eliminates factory catalyst
  • Direct bolt-in upgrade requires no cutting or welding to install and eases re-installation of stock exhaust system
  • MRT engineers this Performance Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation
  • Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools
  • All necessary hardware included

APPLICATION:
  • Fits 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018 Subaru WRX STI
  • Does not fit Subaru WRX; see MRT Turbo-Back Performance Exhaust System without Cats for the 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018 Subaru WRX
  • Off road use only
  • Emissions compliance not warranted; you are responsible to verify local requirements
  • Custom tune recommended; call MRT at (734) 455-5807 for availability

Products.ProductFeatures:
Dial in your exact boost enhancement setting for your Ford vehicle equipped with the 2.7L EcoBoost engine with the JMS BoostMAX. Installation is truly plug and play. Just disconnect your stock MAP, TIP and Pedal connector, then plug in your new JMS Boost control module tuning device. Once you've installed the system, you'll benefit from reduced turbo lag, improved acceleration, and increased low to mid-range horsepower and torque. JMS provides an estimated 5 PSI of extra boost.

Some customers have even reported an estimated gain of up to 2 MPG with normal use. The BoostMAX systems easy-to-use interface provides system status information and diagnostics at a glance. The included Remote Boost Adjustment Knob allows you to fine tune your boost setting and add up to 5 PSI. For maximum performance, this JMS BoostMAX Boost Enhancer can be stacked with the JMS PedalMAX Throttle Enhancer and a custom tune.

Each BoostMAX Kit Contains: BoostMAX Boost Enhancer, Plug & Play Wiring Harness, Remote Boost Control Knob, Installation Kit, Set of Instructions.

Products.ProductFeatures:
The Gen 2 Rear Window Louver for the 2015-17 Mustang features a new hinge design engineered to improve the functionality of the best louver on the market. The curvature of the louver closely follows the Mustang's rear window glass accentuating the sleek styling of the S550 body panels. It features a one piece, aircraft-grade aluminum design, making the louver lightweight and durable.

With the high quality, satin black powder-coat finish, MRT Rear Window Louvers are ready to install right out of the box! No sheet metal drilling or other modifications to your Mustang are required for installation. The included prop rod kit secures the louver in position making cleaning of the back glass a quick, painless, one person job.

The perfect fit! The stylish MRT Rear Window Louver completes the natural lines of the 2015-17 Ford Mustang for a timeless muscle car look.

Products.ProductName: 2014 - 2018 C7 Corvette Stingray MRT Aluminum Rear Window Louvers
Products.ProductDescription:
Team MRT engineered the Chevrolet C7 Corvette louver to be functional and durable, while maintaining a sleek design that you will love on your Corvette. The MRT Rear Window Louver completes the natural lines of the 2014 and up C7 Corvette without compromising rear window visibility. The curvature of each louver is designed to produce a tight, flowing look and an arc that complements the Corvette's rear window. In addition, each Corvette louver features a smooth, seamless surface, free of distracting rivets and protruding hardware. The MRT Rear Window Louver for the 2014+ C7 Corvette is sure to give your Corvette a legendary look.
The MRT Corvette Rear Window Louver comes powder-coated satin black and ready to install. The louver may be painted to your taste, but the satin black finish will look great on your 2014+ C7 Corvette. The MRT louver is a one piece all-aluminum design that is lightweight and durable. It is hinged to allow you to easily lift the louver for cleaning. The included MRT Prop Rod Kit makes handling the louver a one-person job. The MRT C7 Corvette Rear Window Louver requires no sheet metal drilling or modifications to your car during installation of the louver. A Corvette Louver Hardware Kit is included, and we provide you with the louver instructions and materials you need. MRT louvers are made and engineered in America.

These Louvers are also available in a variety of custom painted finishes. Please contact us at (734) 455-5807 for more information on custom painted Rear Window Louvers.
  • Powder-coated satin black and ready to install
  • One-piece, all-aluminum construction
  • Designed to compliment the lines of the C7 Corvette
  • Hinged design for easy cleaning
  • Louver hardware kit included
  • Louver prop rod kit included
  • Engineered & manufactured in the USA by MRT
  • Highest quality louver best value on the market

Products.ProductName: MRT Original No Drill Hood Struts #80U901
Products.ProductDescription:
Don't let your factory prop rod distract from all that power you've packed under the hood. Give your engine bay a clean, custom look with MRT Hood Struts for the 2015 + Ford Mustang, featuring the Original "No Drill" design.
Unlike other Hood Strut Kits in the aftermarket, the MRT Kit requires NO DRILLING for installation, meaning no holes drilled ANYWHERE. MRT Hood Struts easily install in 15 minutes or less from start to finish. The only tools required are a ratchet with 10 mm and 13 mm sockets. Because MRT designed this kit for the 2015-19 Mustang GT350, there are no extra modifications to the vehicle. Components simply bolt on at OEM factory mounting locations.

Gas Cylinders in all MRT kits feature a black powder-coat finish. Several finish options are available for the Hood Strut Brackets. The standard bracket finish is a satin black powder-coat. To give your Mustang a personalized touch, upgrade to one of our many custom paint options. Select your custom paint option above or contact MRT at (734) 455-5807 to order. Please allow a 1-2 week lead time for custom painted brackets.

NOTE: THE MRT HOOD STRUTS ARE DESIGNED TO WORK WITH STOCK OEM HOOD. AFTERMARKET HOODS MAY REQUIRE DIFFERENT CYLINDERS. THE WEIGHT OF THE AFTERMARKET HOOD WILL BE REQUIRED TO SUPPLY YOU WITH THE APPROPRIATE CYLINDERS. PLEASE CONTACT MRT FOR MORE INFORMATION.

Products.ProductName: 2013 - 2017 Ford Fiesta Ecoboost 1.6L BoostMAX Performance Booster
Products.ProductDescription: <inline style="font-size: 16px;">In minutes, dial in a custom boost setting for your 1.6L Ford Fiesta ST I-4 Ford EcoBoost engine with the JMS boost control module. Installation is truly plug and play. Just disconnect your stock MAP, TIP, and Pedal connector, then plug in your new JMS Boost control module tuning device. Once you've installed the system, you'll benefit from reduced turbo lag, improved acceleration, and increased low to mid-range horsepower and torque. JMS provides an estimated average increase in horsepower of 20+ HP.Some customers have even reported an estimated gain of up to 2 MPG with normal use. The BoostMAX systems easy-to-use interface provides system status information and diagnostics at a glance. The included Remote Boost Adjustment Knob allows you to fine tune your boost setting and add up to 5 PSI. For maximum performance, this JMS BoostMAX Boost Enhancer can be stacked with the JMS PedalMAX Throttle Enhancer and a JMS Custom Calibration.</inline>

Products.ProductFeatures:
The JMS PedalMAX Throttle Response Controller is a simple, affordable upgrade that greatly increases the responsiveness of your Ford Fiesta ST 1.6L Ecoboost across the full RPM range.

Offering easy plug and play installation, the JMS PedalMAX Controller lets you enjoy the performance benefits of this upgrade in a matter of minutes. No calibration adjustments are required. The controller will work with your Fiesta ST, regardless of whether it is stock or heavily modified.

The JMS Throttle Response Controller is an easy and effective way to improve throttle response and driving characteristics on your Ford Fiesta ST. It is a digital microprocessor-controlled device and dramatically improves throttle reaction and acceleration.

The JMS PedalMax controller can be stacked or used in conjunction with common aftermarket OBD-II programmers and monitor, including SCT Handheld Tuners. However, no additional calibration is required to reap the benefits.

Optional remote adjustment knob used to dial in your exact throttle enhancement setting.

This product will fit the following vehicles:
2013-2017 Ford Fiesta ST 1.6L Eco-Boost

Products.ProductDescription:
The story of how Scott T. Hoag, former Team Mustang Customization Manager, marshaled resources within the Ford Motor Company to produce two legendary nameplates, the 2001 Bullitt and 2003/04 Mach 1 Mustangs.

- A full color hardback book published by T-5 Design LLC and licensed by Ford Motor Company.

As told to Mustang enthusiast Anthony S. Alonso, who currently owns a black 2001 Bullitt and previously an azure blue 2003 Mach 1, this Mustang Enthusiast book "ENGINEER + ENTHUSIAST = EXCITEMENT" relates the journey to bring two special edition Mustang models to market for the last â€œhurrahâ€ of the SN-95 Mustang line.

From concept car to production model, the 2001 Bullitt started production in spring 2001, an astounding 14 months after being displayed as a concept at the 2000 Los Angeles Auto Show. The 2003/04 Mach 1 was planned while the Bullitt was still in development and released in late 2002. Scottâ€™s passion, fueled by his long-time enthusiast focus and his engineering know-how within the Ford Motor Company system, resulted in two well-received vehicles. Each car was a look back and celebration of the heritage of a well-known movie car from 1968 and optional model from 1969/70.

Scott reminisces with the reader in his subtle but humorous style, providing a first-hand account of what it took to shepherd two special Mustangs to market. He tells the tale of working at Ford Motor Company and employing a careful balance of teamwork, dedication, and vision. The fruits of that labor were for those among the most dedicated of Fordâ€™s customers â€“ the performance car enthusiast. The 2001 Bullitt inspired the making of the 2008/09 and 2019 editions. Scott also reflects on those versions and the possibilities of future feature cars.

Available as of June, 1, 2018, sit back, take a read, and look at the complement of behind-the-scenes photos in a full color, 112-page hardback book. ENGINEER + ENTHUSIAST = EXCITEMENT will demonstrate know-how + heart = fun times!

Products.ProductNameShort: 2010-15 Camaro V6 CAI by Cold Air Inductions
Products.METATAG_Keywords: Camaro Cold Air intake, V6 camaro CAI, V6 Camaro cold air intake, Cold air intake for v6 camaro
Products.ProductFeatures:
Maximize your 2010-2015 Chevy Camaro's performance with the high-performance CAI, inc. Cold Air Intake system. Cold air induction by CAI, inc. offers superior quality and craftsmanship while achieving outstanding performance gains. On average, consumers gain 16 RWHP with installation of the CAI, inc. cold air intake system on an otherwise stock 3.6L V6 Chevrolet Camaro. This is a direct replacement for the OEM air box. The kit retains the OEM washer bottle in the stock location. No tune is required for installation. CAI, Inc. proudly makes their Cold Air Intake system for 2010-2015 Camaro V6 in the USA. Available in Black PowderCoat and Near Chrome finishes.

Cold Air Intake system includes:
- Aluminum insulated air box
- Air box
- 3.5" (89 mm) Thermal coated intake tube
- High performance air filter
- Black silicone elbow / stainless clamps
- Installation instructions

Products.ProductDescription:
Badass Series : MRT FRS Single Exit Axle-Back #91Z152F
Loud, Aggressive, Take No Prisoners!

Hear the Difference

  • How does it sound?
    The MRT FRS Single Exit Axle-Back #91Z152F has a aggressive, deep muscle car sound.
  • Is there drone or resonance?
    Drone is comfortable and hardly noticeable.
  • What if I step on it?
    Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound.

Feel the Performance

  • What is the muffler design?
    Straight through design to provide maximum exhaust gas flow.
  • What is the tube diameter?
    Large 2.5" tube is used for reduced exhaust flow restrictions.
  • What are the performance gains?
    Reducing restriction and maximizing flow provide for noticeable gains.

Get Noticed

  • What kind of tip is it?
    4" double wall, polished T304 stainless steel tips with beveled edges.
  • What are my system finish options?
    Metal SS : No Finish or the Black Ops : Total System Blackout.
  • What are my tip finish options?
    Metal SS : Polished Tips or the Black Ops : Dual Tip Blackout.

Vehicle Application

  • Which vehicles does this fit?
    2013, 2014, 2015, 2016,2017 and 2018
    Scion FRS
  • What doesn't it fit?
  • Does it require a tune?
    No tune is required for this type of upgrade.

Product Quality
  • What kind of steel is it made from?
    Corrosion resistant T304 stainless steel.
  • Where is it made?
    Developed and handcrafted in-house at our facility in Plymouth Michigan USA.
  • How long is the Warranty?
    Limited Lifetime Warranty (See Warranty Page for Details)

Installation

  • Can I install this myself?
    MRT engineers this Premium Exhaust System for a simple do-it-yourself (DIY) installation.
  • How long does it take to install?
    Installation time is about 1 hour and requires only common hand tools.
  • What is included?
    All necessary hardware included.

Products.ProductName: 2016 - 2017 Chevy SS Roto-Fab Cold Air Intake
Products.ProductDescription: Many vendors have found sealing an induction system from engine bay heat to be quite difficult on the new Chevy SS. Not Roto-fab, they've taken the time to ensure you get the most out of your CAI by sealing off the top of the induction box, forcing true cold air in from behind the bumper. With gains upwards of 11rwhp, and plenty of added throttle response, you won't be disappointed with this upgrade. The install can be completed in under an hour with simple hand tools, and doesn't require a new PCM calibration, so you can get right back on the road. Roto-fab Cold Air Induction systems come with a pre-oiled, washable, conical air filter for maximum performance. This induction comes with a black texture finish, but is also available in Carbon Fiber for that classy performance look under your hood.
Products.Google_Product_Type: Vehicles & Parts > Vehicle Parts & Accessories > Motor Vehicle Parts > Motor Vehicle Engine Parts
Products.METATAG_Description: Roto-FabÂ intake for a 2016 - 2017 Chevrolet SS features an air box, intake tube, and high flow filter designed to improve performance, torque, and, horsepower.

Balanced Sound and Performance

Hear the Difference

  • How does it sound?
    The MRT Interceptor Axle-Back #91U920 has a balanced, deep muscle car sound.
  • Is there drone or resonance?
    Drone is comfortable and hardly noticeable.
  • What if I step on it?
    Wide open throttle increases exhaust loudness and tone to an aggressive performance sound.

Feel the Performance

    Straight through design to provide maximum exhaust gas flow.
  • What is the tube diameter?
    Large 2.5" tube is used for reduced exhaust flow restrictions.
  • What are the performance gains?
    Reducing restriction and maximizing flow provide for noticeable gains.

Products.METATAG_Description: Get the most of out of your 2012-2015 Chevy Camaro V6 with the MRT Version 2.0 Performance Package. This premium bundles includes the MRT Version 2.0 Axle-Back, Solo Performance High Flow Catalytic Converters, and CAI, Inc. Cold Air Intake Kit.

Products.Photo_AltText: V6 Camaro MRT V2 Performance Package
Products.ProductKeywords: Camaro, V6, Chevrolet, Chevy, LS, RS, RT, Cold Air Intake, Cold Air Induction, CAI, Catalytic Converters, Catalysts, Cats, High Flow, Performance, Axle-Back, Exhaust, Mufflers, Package, Version 2.0, v2, MRT
Products.ExtInfo:
Thanks for choosing MRT for your performance exhaust needs - we appreciate your business! Our team is proud to stand behind our handcrafted systems, and we sincerely hope that you enjoy your new exhaust for years to come. MRT provides a LIMITED LIFETIME WARRANTY on all MRT manufactured 304 Stainless Steel exhaust systems. The Limited Lifetime Warranty applies only to REGISTERED MRT products.

How to Register Your MRT Exhaust

You must submit your Registration Form within 30 DAYS of receiving the product in order to qualify for MRT's Limited Lifetime Warranty. In addition, you must submit PROOF OF PURCHASE with your warranty registration form in order for your warranty to be valid. Acceptable proof of purchase is a copy of the original invoice or receipt received at the time of purchase. If you have questions or concerns regarding proof of purchase, contact MRT directly for assistance.

Submit completed Warranty Registration Form with Proof of Purchase by email to sales@mrt-direct.com, or by mail to 45646 Port St. Plymouth, MI 48170. Please don't hesitate to contact MRT at (734) 455-5807 or sales@mrt-direct.com. We are happy to assist you in registering your exhaust for warranty.

Coverage

This warranty covers defects in material and workmanship for the purchaser of record on the vehicle in which the system was originally installed. This does not include blemishes or appearance deficiencies due to weather, road hazard or lack of maintenance. Included exhaust tips are covered under the Limited Lifetime Warranty for rust-through damage. Note that in some cases surface rust can be expected and is not covered by this warranty. If you are unsure of the difference between surface rust and rust through, please contact MRT directly for clarification.

MRT's High Flow Catalytic Converters are not covered under the Limited Lifetime Warranty; however, they do carry a 90 day manufacturerï¿½s warranty. The MaxFlow Race H-Pipe Systems with Race Catalysts are intended for racing applications and are not covered under warranty.

The warranty is void if the product is not installed properly, or if it has been modified or altered in any way. If you believe that modification will be required to fit an MRT Exhaust system on your vehicle, please contact MRT BEFORE making any modifications to the system. MRT is not liable for any incidental charges outside of the replacement exhaust system itself; these charges include, but are not limited to, labor charges, freight fees, loss of use or damage to vehicle.

Again, thanks for shopping with MRT. Drop us a line with any questions or concerns you have. Customer Service is our top priority and your feedback is appreciated. We look forward to working with you again in the future.


Download Warranty Registration Form
Products.METATAG_Keywords: Chevrolet Camaro, Chevy Camaro, 5th gen Camaro, 5th gen, Camaro V6, V6 Camaro, Camaro, V6, Chevrolet, Chevy, LS, RS, RT, Camaro RS, RS Camaro, Camero, Cold Air Intake, Cold Air, Intake, Cool Air, Cool Air Intake, Cold Air Induction, CAI, Catalytic Converters, Catalysts, Cats, High Flow, Performance, Axle-Back, Exhaust, Mufflers, Package, Version 2.0, v2, MRT
Products.ProductFeatures:
Get the most out of your 3.6L V6 engine with the MRT V2.0 Performance Package for 2010-2014 Chevrolet Camaro. This premium package includes: 1) CAI, Inc. High-Performance Cold Air Intake, 2) MRT Version 2.0 V6 Axle-Back Exhaust, and 3) Solo Performance High-Flow Catalytic Converters.

Cold Air Induction by CAI, Inc. offers superior quality and craftsmanship, while achieving outstanding performance gains. On average, consumers gain an estimated 16 RWHP with installation of the CAI, Inc. Cold Air Intake System on an otherwise stock 3.6L V6 Chevrolet Camaro.

The MRT Version 2.0 Axle-Back Exhaust sweetens the deal by offering classic, muscle car sound and improved performance. This exhaust system is constructed out of the highest quality 304 Stainless Steel for maximum corrosion protection. 3.5 inch polished stainless steel exhaust tips are included. MRT handcrafts its exhausts in-house at its facility in Plymouth, Michigan.

Ultra high flow catalytic converters from Solo Performance rounds out the Version 2.0 Performance Package by offering increased exhaust flow and performance gains. Like the MRT Version 2.0 Axle-Back, these high flow catalysts are Made in America.

Products.ProductDescription:
MRT has designed and manufactured a simple solution for customers who want to upgrade their exhaust on a vehicle that has factory installed AFM / NPP devices. Now this simple to install solution allows customers to install a performance exhaust without having to tune their car to defeat the AFM / NPP.
The MRT AFM/NPP Power Plateâ„¢ is made from durable 304 stainless steel, designed and manufactured in the USA by MRT. How it works: it is a plate that mounts to the AFM electric motor that allows the Motor to cycle as the car's computer expects it to allowing the customer to enjoy a full time performance exhaust without having to tune their car.
We stand behind all of our products. We take great pride in what we do and we let the quality of our work speak for itself. Like all MRT designed, engineered and manufactured exhaust products, the MRT AFM/NPP Power Plateâ„¢ is designed and built to last. ALL MRT branded products are made in the USA. We stand by our exhaust products with full confidence and that is why we provide our industry leading LIMITED LIFETIME WARRANTY.
